name: Stack World
description:
Stack World is a physics puzzle game. Place all the given blocks and make sure they do not fall off the screen before the countdown timer hits 0. Enjoy over 100 levels of gameplay and use the level editor to create your own levels. Compete for the fastest times on the leaderboards.

Gameplay


Place all the given blocks and make sure they do not fall off the screen before the countdown timer hits 0. Each level has different layouts and blocks that are given. Blocks can vary in type, size and rotation. Figure out the best way to stack all the blocks without letting them fall off.

Level Editor


With the level editor, you can create your own levels. To get started, a tutorial is available in the level editor. The levels are saved as (JSON) files on your hard disk. You can give them to friends or other players.

Leaderboards


Levels are placed in packs of 10 levels each. Clear all the levels in a pack without retrying to set a pack time. Compete for the fastest times on the leaderboards. You can also filter to show friends only times.

Translations


Currently, Stack World supports two languages, English and Dutch. I want to support more languages like Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish and German. Stack World is an Indie game done by one developer. I am hoping that more translations can be done with help from the community. The translations are done in a JSON file. If you would like to help, please contact me via the support email.
